juzs.text: Tsey khto ne ochikuyutʹ zustrity nas skazav, "Yakby tilʹky anhely mohly prybuty vnyz do nas, abo my mohly pobachyty nashoho Lorda (my todi by poviryly)!" Diysno, vony zdiysnyly velyku zukhvalistʹ, ta vyrobyly velykyy blasphemy
denʹ vony bachatʹ anhely, tse ne bude harnu novynu dlya vynuvatu; vony skazhutʹ, "Zaraz, my irreversibly obmezhuyemosya
My podyvymosʹ na vsi pratsi vony zrobyly, ta nadayutʹ yim nediysnym
dwellers Rayu ye daleko krashche na tomu dni; vony pochuyutʹ krashchu novynu
nebesa zlamayutʹsya okremo, u bezlich khmar, ta anhely spustyatʹsya u bezlichi
Vesʹ suverenitet na shcho denʹ nalezhytʹ naybilʹsh Dobrozychlyvomu. Dlya disbelievers, tse bude tyazhkyy denʹ
denʹ prybude koly porushnyk ukusytʹ yoho ruky (u bolyu) ta kazhu, 'Na zhalʹ "!, ya by khotiv, shchob ya proslidkuvav za shlyakhom z kur'yerom
Na zhalʹ "!, prykroshchi meni, ya by khotiv, shchob ya ne vzyav shcho osoba yak tovarysh
Vin poviv meni daleko z povidomlennya pislya tse prybuv do meni. Diysno, chort pidvodytʹ yoho lyudsʹki zhertvy
kur'yer skazav, "Miy Lord, moyi lyudy pokynuly tse Quran
My takozh zdiymayemosʹ proty kozhnykh vorohiv proroka z chysla vynuvatoho. Vash Lord bude dostatniy tomu shcho dovidnyk, mayster

Tsey khto disbelieved skazanyy, "Chomu Quran ne prybuv cherez yoho raptovo?" My vidmovylysya vid tse do vas postupovo, aby zafiksuvaty tse u vashiy pam'yati. My deklamuvaly tse u spetsyfichniy poslidovnosti
Shchob ni arhument vony pidkhodyatʹ z, my zabezpechuyemo vas z pravdoyu, ta krashchym rozuminnyam
Tsey khto forcibly sklykayutʹsya do Didʹka u nayhirshiy pozytsiyi; vony yavlyayutʹ soboyu naydalʹshe z prava shlyakh
My daly Moses svyate pysannya, ta pryznachenyy yoho brat Aaron shchob buty yoho asystent
My skazaly, "Idemo, obydva vas, do lyudey kotrykh vidkhylyly nashi vidkryttya," ta z·hodom, my nadzvychayno vynyshchyly rejectors
Analohichno, koly lyudy Noah disbelieved kur'yery, my potopyly yikh, ta my vstanovlyuyemo yikh yak znak dlya lyudey. My mayemo hotovi do porushnykiv bolisnyy retribution
Takozh `aad, Thamoud, meshkantsi Alʹ-Russ, ta bahato heneratsiy mizh nymy
Do kozhnykh z tsykh hrup, my dostavyly dostatni pryklady, pered tym, yak my vynyshchyly yikh
Vony proyshly povz spilʹnoty shcho showered z neshchasnoyu zlyvoyu (Sodom). Vony ne pobachyly tse? Sprava v tomu, vony nikoly ne viryly v resurrection
Koly vony pobachyly vas, vony zavzhdy ridiculed vy: tse vybyrayetʹsya BOHOM buty kur'yer

Vin mayzhe vidviv nas z nashykh bohiv, yakshcho tse ne shcho my steadfastly persevered z nymy." Vony zvychayno znaydutʹ, koly vony bachatʹ retribution, khto yavlyayutʹ soboyu realʹnyy strayers z shlyakhu
vy pobachyly chyy boh ye yoho vlasnyy ego? Vy budete yoho prybichnyk
vy dumayete shcho bilʹshistʹ yikh chuyete, abo rozumiyete? Vony tochno, yak tvaryny; ni, vony ne ye daleko hirshi
vy ne pobachyly yak vashoho Lorda zamyslyly tinʹ? Yakshcho b Vin willed, Vin mih vstyhly fiksovani, todi my by zamyslyly sontse vidpovidnym chynom
Ale my zamyslyly tse posunuty povilʹno
Vin yavlyaye soboyu odyn khto zamyslyv nich buty obkladynka, ta dlya vas spaty ta vidpochynok. Ta Vin zrobyv denʹ resurrection
Vin yavlyaye soboyu odyn khto posylaye viter z harnymy oznakamy Yoho myloserdya, ta my posylayemo vnyz z neba chysta voda
Z tse, my vidnovlyuyemo mertvi zemli ta zabezpechuyemo napiy dlya nashykh stvorennya - bezlich tvaryn ta humans
My rozpodilyly tse sered nykh u tochniy miri, shcho vony mozhutʹ vzyaty uvahu. Ale naybilʹsh lyudy napolyahayutʹ na disbelieving
Yakshcho my willed, my mohly poslaly do kozhnoyi spilʹnoty warner
Tomu, ne pidkoryayutʹsya disbelievers, ta dokladayutʹ zusylʹ proty nykh z tse, velykym prahnuchym

Vin yavlyaye soboyu odyn khto zlyvaye dva morya; kozhnyy ye svizhyy ta palatable, v toy chas, yak inshyy solonyy ta undrinkable. Ta Vin vidokremyv yikh z formidable, nedotorkanym bar'yerom (evaporation)
Vin yavlyaye soboyu odyn khto stvoryuvav z vody lyudsʹkoyi buduchy, todi zroblenoyu yomu vidtvoryuyutʹ cherez shlyub ta mating. Vash Lord Omnipotent
Dosi, vony dosi zdiymayutʹsya bilya idoliv BOHA shcho ne mozhutʹ yim vyhody, ne shkoda yim. Diysno, disbeliever ye voroh yoho Lorda
My poslaly vam (Rashad) yak deliverer harnoyi novyny, tak zhe, yak i warner
Kazhu, "ya ne proshu vas dlya budʹ-yakykh hroshey. Vesʹ ya prahnu mushu dopomohty vy znakhodyte pravo shlyakh do vashoho Lorda, yakshcho tse ye shcho vy vybyrayete
Vy budete postavyty vashu doviru u khto vmiye Zhyvyy khto nikoly ne vmyraye - ta khvalyte Yoho ta glorify Yo. Vin tsilkom Cognizant Yoho hrikhiv stvorinʹ

Vin yavlyaye soboyu odyn khto utvoryv nebo ta zemlyu, ta vse mizh nymy, u shesty dnyakh, todi prypustylo vesʹ avtorytet. Naybilʹsh Dobrozychlyvyy; poprositʹ pro Yoho tsey khto dobre zasnovuyutʹsya u znanni

Koly vony rozpovidayutʹsya, 'Padayutʹ prostrate pered naybilʹsh Dobrozychlyvym,' yak kazhutʹ, 'Shcho yavlyaye soboyu Naybilʹsh Dobrozychlyvyy? My budemo prostrate pered tym, yak yakyy prybichnyk vas?" Otzhe, tse tilʹky zbilʹshuye yikhnyu antypatiyu
Naybilʹsh blahoslovlenyy yavlyaye soboyu odyn khto rozmistyv suzirya' u nebi, ta rozmishchenomu u tse lampa, ta blyshchachyy misyatsʹ
Vin yavlyaye soboyu odyn khto zamyslyv nich ta denʹ do zastupnyka: dostatniy dokaz dlya tsykh khto bazhayutʹ vzyaty uvahu, abo shchob buty appreciative
worshipers naybilʹsh Dobrozychlyvoho tsey khto stupayutʹ zemlya gently, ta koly neobiznana rozmovlyayutʹ z nymy, vony tilʹky vymovlyayutʹ myr
U tayemnosti nochi, vony rozdumuyutʹ na yikhnʹomu Lordi, ta padayutʹ prostrate
Ta yak kazhutʹ, "Nash Lord, ekonomlyatʹ nas ahoniya Pekla; yoho retribution ye horrendous
Tse yavlyaye soboyu nayhirshyy abode; nayhirsha dolya
Koly vony dayutʹ, vony ni ekstravahantnyy ni stingy; vony prypynyayutʹ opir moderation

Vony nikoly ne blahayutʹ bilya BOHA budʹ-yakyy inshyy boh, ne roblyatʹ vony ubyvayutʹ budʹ khto - dlya BOHA zrobyly dovichnyy svyashchennyy - krim na protyazi spravedlyvosti. Ne robyty vony zdiysnyuyutʹ adyulʹter. Tsey khto zdiysnyuyutʹ tsi zlochyny bude povynen rozplatytysya
Retribution podvoyuyetʹsya dlya nykh na Dni Resurrection, ta vony perebuyutʹ tam prynyzheni
Zvilʹnenyy ye tsey khto kayutʹsya, vvazhayutʹ, ta vedutʹ spravedlyve zhyttya. BOH peretvoryuye yikhni hrikhy u kredyty. BOH Forgiver, Naybilʹsh Myloserdnyy
Tsey khto kayutʹsya ta vedutʹ spravedlyve zhyttya, BOH vykupovuye yikh; povnotsinna vyplata
Vony ne rodyatʹ nevirnoho svidka. Koly vony zustrichayutʹ marnu rozmovu, vony ihnoruyutʹ tse
Koly nahaduvaly pro yikhni vidkryttya Lorda, vony nikoly ne reahuyutʹ na nykh tak, yakby vony buly hlukhi ta slipyy
Ta yak kazhutʹ, "Nash Lord, dozvolyav nashe podruzhzhya ta dity budutʹ dzherelo radosti dlya nas, ta derzhatʹ nas u forefront spravedlyvi
Tsey yavlyayutʹ soboyu khto dosyahayutʹ Rayu v obmin na yikhniy steadfastness; vony otrymuyutʹsya tam z joyous pryvitannyamy ta myrom
Vichno vony perebuyutʹ tam; shcho krasyva dolya; shcho krasyvyy abode
Kazhete, "Vy dosyahayete velychyny u moyomu Lordi tilʹky naskrizʹ vashomu obozhnyuyete. Ale yakshcho vy disbelieve, vy zaznayete nemynuchykh naslidkiv
M. (Ta, Dyvyvsya, Mim)
Tsey (lysty) utvoryuyutʹ dokazy tse roz'yasnyayuche svyate pysannya
Vy mozhete osudyty sebe shcho vony ne viruyuchi
Yakshcho my budemo, my mozhemo poslaty z neba znak shcho prymushuye yikhni shyyi uklonytysya
Koly zavhodno reminder z naybilʹsh Dobrozychlyvoho prybuvaye yim, shcho ye novi, vony prohanyayutʹ u antypatiyi
Z vony disbelieved, vony zaznaly naslidkiv yikhnʹoho heedlessness
vony ne pobachyly zemlyu, ta skilʹky riznovydiv krasyvykh zavodiv my vyrosly na tomu
Tse povynno buty dostatniy dokaz dlya nykh, ale bilʹshistʹ yikh ne viruyuchi
Naybilʹsh bezperechno, vash Lord yavlyaye soboyu Mohutniy, Naybilʹsh Myloserdnyy
Vidklykannya shcho vash Lord zaklykav Moses: "Poyidʹte do porushuyuchykh lyudey
Pharaoh lyudy; mozhlyvo vony reformuyutʹ
Vin skazav, "Miy Lord, ya bo lest vony disbelieve meni
ya mozhu vtratyty moyu vytrymku. Miy yazyk pryyizhdzhaye pryv'yazanyy; poshlitʹ dlya moho brata Aaron
Takozh, vony roz·hlyadayutʹ meni fugitive; YA bo lest vony ubyvayutʹ meni
Vin skazav, Nomer, (vony ne ne budutʹ). Poyidʹte z Moyimy dokazamy. My budemo z vamy, slukhayuchy
Idutʹ Pharaoh ta kazhutʹ, `we kur'yery z Lorda vsesvitu
let Dity Izrayilya idutʹ
Vin skazav, my ne pidnyaly vas z rannʹoho dytynstva, ta vy vytratyly bahato rokiv z namy
Todi vy skoyily zlochyn shcho vy zdiysnyly, ta vy buly ungrateful
Vin skazav, "Diysno, ya zrobyv tse koly ya astray
Todi ya fled, koly ya bo vas, ta miy Lord nadav pravo meni z wisdom ta zroblenyy meni odyn z kur'yeriv
Vy khvalytesʹ shcho vy meni prykhylʹnistʹ, toy chas, yak ponevolyuyuchy Ditey Izrayilya
Pharaoh skazav, "Shcho yavlyaye soboyu Lorda vsesvitu
Vin skazav, Lord neba ta zemli, ta vse mizh nymy. Vy povynni buty pevni pro tse
Vin skazav tsʹomu navkolo yoho, vy pochuly tse
Vin skazav, "Vash Lord ta Lord vashykh predkiv
Vin skazav, "Vash kur'yer komu posylayetʹsya do vy ye bozhevilʹni
Vin skazav, Lord skhodu ta zakhodu, ta vse mizh nymy, yakshcho vy rozumiyete
Vin skazav, "Yakshcho vy vyznayete budʹ-yakoho boha, za vynyatkom meni, ya kynu vas u tyurmi
Vin skazav, "Shcho yakshcho ya pokazuyu vam shchosʹ hlyboke
Vin skazav, "Todi vyroblyayete tse, yakshcho vy ye pravdyvi
Vin todi kynuv yoho personal, whereupon tse stalo hlybokoyu zmiyeyu
Ta vin vytyahuvav yoho ruku, ta bulo bilo do beholders
Vin skazav elders navkolo yoho, "Tse ye dosvidchenyy charivnyk
Vin zakhoche vzyaty vas z vashoyi zemli, z yoho zacharuvannyam. Shcho vy naproshuyetesya
Vony skazaly, "Respite yo ta yoho brat, ta posylayutʹ summoners do kozhnoho mista
Dozvolyayutʹ yim sklykayutʹ kozhnoho dosvidchenoho charivnyka
charivnyky buly zibrani u pryznachenomu chasi, na pryznachenomu dni
lyudyam buly kazani: "Prybutyy ta vesʹ; dozvolʹte nam zbyrayutʹsya razom tut
Mozhlyvo my proslidkuyemo za charivnykamy, yakshcho vony yavlyayutʹ soboyu peremozhtsiv
Koly charivnyky prybuly, vony skazaly Pharaoh, my pryyizhdzhayemo zaplacheni, yakshcho my yavlyayemo soboyu peremozhtsiv
Vin skazav, "Tak diysno; vy budete navitʹ blyzʹko do meni
Moses skazanyy yim "Kydayete shcho vy zbyrayetesya kynuty
Vony kynuly yikhni kanaty ta palky, ta skazaly, Pharaoh velychnistʹ, my budemo peremozhtsi
Moses kynulo yoho personal, whereupon tse kovtnuti shcho vony vyhotovyly
charivnyky upaly prostrate
Vony skazaly, "My virymo v Lordu vsesvitu
Lord Moses ta Aaron

Vin skazav, vy vvazhaly z nym pered tym, yak ya dayu vam dozvil? Vin povynen buty vash uchytelʹ, khto navchyv vas zacharuvannya. Vy bezsumnivno znaydete. YA roz'yednayu vashi ruky ta nohy na zminnykh storonakh. YA budu crucify vy vsi
Vony skazaly, "Tse ne zminytʹ nashe rishennya; do nashoho Lorda my povernemosya
My spodivayemosʹ shcho nash Lord prostytʹ nas nashi hrikhy, osoblyvo shcho my yavlyayemo soboyu pershykh viruyuchiv
My nadykhnuly Moses: "Peresuvannya z Moyimy sluzhbovtsyamy; vy budete peresliduvatysya
Pharaoh poslav do mist callers
(Proholoshuyutʹ,) "Tse ye mala banda
Vony zaraz protystavlyayutʹ nas
Dozvolyayutʹ nam vsim berezhutʹsya yikh
Otzhe, my pozbavyly yikh parku ta pruzhyn
Ta skarby ta pochesna pozytsiya
Todi my vstyhly spadkovistʹ dlya Ditey Izrayilya
Vony peresliduvaly yikh do skhodu
Koly obydva storony dyvylysya odyn odnoho, Moses' lyudy skazaly, "My budemo caught
Vin skazav, "Niyakyy shlyakh. Miy Lord zi mnoyu; Vin bude keruvaty meni
My todi nadykhnuly Moses: "Vrazyty more z vashym personalom, "whereupon tse rozdilylosya. Kozhna chastyna vyhlyadala yak velykyy pahorb
My todi dostavyly yim vsim
My takym chynom vryatuvaly Moses ta vesʹ tsey khto z nym
Ta my potopyly inshi
Tse povynno buty dostatniy dokaz, ale naybilʹsh lyudy ne viruyuchi
Naybilʹsh bezperechno, vash Lord yavlyaye soboyu Mohutniy, Naybilʹsh Myloserdnyy
Rozpovidayutʹ yim Abraham istoriya
Vin skazav yoho batʹkovi ta yoho lyudyam, "Yaki tsi vy obozhnyuyete
Vony skazaly, "My obozhnyuyemo statuyi; my povnistyu prysvyachuyemosya yim
Vin skazav, vony 'Mozhutʹ pochuty vas koly vy blahayete
vony vyhoda vy, abo 'Mozhete zavdaty shkody vam
Vony skazaly, Nomer; ale my znayshly nashykh batʹkiv roblyache tse
Vin skazav, "Robyte vy bachyte tsykh idoliv shcho vy obozhnyuyete
Vy ta vashi predky
ya ye proty nykh, dlya ya prysvyachuyusʹ tilʹky do Lorda vsesvitu
khto stvoryuvav meni, ta kerovanyy meni
khto hoduye meni ta vody meni
Ta koly ya pryyizhdzhayu khvoryy, Vin hoyitʹsya meni
khto stavytʹ meni do smerti, todi prynosytʹ meni nazad do zhyttya
khto hopefully prostytʹ moyi hrikhy na Dni Vyroku
Miy Lord, harantuyutʹ meni wisdom, ta vklyuchayutʹ meni z spravedlyvyy
Dozvolyayu pryklad ya vstanovlyuyu na maybutnye heneratsiyi budutʹ harnyy
Roblyatʹ meni odyn z inheritors blissful Rayu
Ta probachayutʹ moyomu batʹkovi, dlya vin zablukavsya
Ta ne forsake meni na Dni Resurrection
Shcho yavlyaye soboyu denʹ koly ni hroshi, ni dity, mozhutʹ dopomohty
Tilʹky tsey khto prybuvaly do BOHA z yikhnim vsim sertsem (bude ryatuvatysya)
Ray bude predstavlyatysya do spravedlyvyy
Peklo bude vydavatysya sebe za strayers
Vony budutʹ prosytysya, "De yavlyayutʹ soboyu idoliv vy obozhnyuvaly
bilya BOHA? Vony mozhutʹ dopomohty vam zaraz? Vony mozhutʹ dopomohty sebe
Vony budutʹ kydatysya tam, razom z strayers
Ta vesʹ Satan soldaty
Vony skazhutʹ tomu shcho vony tryvala vorozhnecha tam
BOHOM, my daleko astray
Yak my mohly vstanovyty vas do rozryadu z Lordom vsesvitu
Tsey khto pryzvely do pomylky ny buly bezputni
Zaraz my ne mayemo poserednykiv
Ne yedynyy blyzʹkyy pryyatelʹ
Yakby tilʹky my mohly otrymaty inshyy shans, my todi by poviryly
Tse povynno buty harnyy urok. Ale naybilʹsh lyudy ne viruyuchi
Vash Lord yavlyaye soboyu Mohutniy, Naybilʹsh Myloserdnyy
lyudy Noah disbelieved kur'yery
Yikhniy brat Noah skazanyy yim, "Chy ne mohly b vy ne spravedlyvi
ya ye chesnyy kur'yer do vas
Vy budete BOH povahy ta pidkoryayetesya meni
ya ne proshu vas dlya budʹ-yakoyi zarplaty. Moya zarplata prybuvaye z Lorda vsesvitu
Vy budete BOH povahy ta pidkoryayetesya meni
Vony skazaly, "Yak my mozhemo poviryty z vamy, koly nayhirshyy sered nas mozhemo proslidkuvaly za vamy
Vin skazav, "Yak ya znayu yaki vony
Yikhniy vyrok vidpochyvaye tilʹky z moyim Lordom, yakshcho vy mohly spryynyaty
ya nikoly ne vidpushchu viruyuchiv
ya ne ye bilʹsh nizh roz'yasnyayuchyy warner
Vony skazaly, 'Yakshcho "ne vy utrymuyetesya, O Noah, vy budete stoned
Vin skazav, "Miy Lord, moyi lyudy disbelieved meni
Harantuyutʹ meni peremoha proty nykh, ta dostavlyayutʹ meni ta moya kompaniya viruyuchiv
My dostavyly yomu ta tsʹomu khto suprovodyly yoho u navantazhenomu ark
Todi my potopyly inshi
Tse povynno buty urok, ale naybilʹsh lyudy ne viruyuchi
Naybilʹsh bezperechno, vash Lord yavlyaye soboyu Mohutniy, Naybilʹsh Myloserdnyy
aad disbelieved kur'yery
Yikhnya Kryshka brata skazanoho yim, "Chy ne mohly b vy ne spravedlyvi
ya ye chesnyy kur'yer do vas
Vy budete BOH povahy, ta pidkoryayetesya meni
ya ne proshu vas dlya budʹ-yakoyi zarplaty; moya zarplata prybuvaye z Lorda vsesvitu
Vy buduyete na kozhnomu pahorbi osobnyak zarady vanity
Vy vstanovlyuyete budynky tak, yakby vy tryvayete vichno
Ta koly vy vrazhayete, vy vrazhayete bezzhalisno
Vy budete BOH povahy ta pidkoryayetesya meni
Povaha kotra yakshcho vy z vsima rechamy vy znayete
Vin yakshcho vy z domashnoyu khudoboyu ta ditʹmy
Ta park ta strybaye
ya bo dlya vas retribution awesome dnya
Vony skazaly, "Tse yavlyaye soboyu toy zhe samyy vy propoviduyete chy, abo ne propoviduyete
Shcho affliction buv obmezhenyy do nashykh predkiv
Niyakyy retribution ne bude kolysʹ befall ny
Vony takym chynom disbelieved ta, otzhe, my vynyshchyly yikh. Tse povynno buty urok, ale naybilʹsh lyudy ne viruyuchi
Naybilʹsh bezperechno, vash Lord yavlyaye soboyu Mohutniy, Naybilʹsh Myloserdnyy
Thamoud disbelieved kur'yery
Yikhniy brat Saaleh skazanyy yim, "Chy ne mohly b vy ne spravedlyvi
ya ye chesnyy kur'yer do vas
Vy budete BOH povahy, ta pidkoryayetesya meni
ya ne proshu vas dlya budʹ-yakoyi zarplaty; moya zarplata prybuvaye tilʹky z Lorda vsesvitu
vy vvazhayete vy budete lyshatysya zavzhdy, zabezpechuyete u tsiy derzhavi
Vy polyublyayete park ta pruzhyny
Ta zerno ta datuyutʹ palʹmy z duzhe smachnymy fruktamy
Vy vyrizayete z hor rozkishni osobnyaky
Vy budete BOH povahy, ta pidkoryayetesya meni
Ne pidkoryayutʹsya porushnykam
Khto zdiysnyuyutʹ zlo, ne harni pratsi
Vony skazaly, "Vy bewitched
Vy ne vyhlyadayete bilʹsh nizh lyudsʹki yak ny. Vyrobitʹ chudo, yakshcho vy ye pravdyvi
Vin skazav, "Osʹ verblyud shcho vyp'ye tilʹky na dni shcho pryznachayetʹsya yiy; denʹ tse rizno z vashykh vstanovlenykh dniv p'yuchykh
Ne torkayetesya yiyi z budʹ-yakoyu shkodoyu, lest vy zaznayete retribution na awesome denʹ
Vony ubyly yiyi, ta takym chynom zaznaly horya
retribution overwhelmed yim. Tse povynno buty urok, ale naybilʹsh lyudy ne viruyuchi
Naybilʹsh bezperechno, vash Lord yavlyaye soboyu Mohutniy, Naybilʹsh Myloserdnyy
lyudy Doli disbelieved kur'yery
Yikhnya Dolya brata skazanoho yim, "Chy ne mohly b vy ne spravedlyvi
ya ye chesnyy kur'yer do vas
Vy budete BOH povahy, ta pidkoryayetesya meni
ya ne proshu vas dlya budʹ-yakoyi zarplaty; moya zarplata prybuvaye tilʹky z Lorda vsesvitu
vy mayete statʹ z muzhchynamy, vsikh lyudey
Vy forsake zhinky shcho vash Lord utvoryv dlya vas! Diysno, vy porushuyete lyudey
Vony skazaly, 'Yakshcho "ne vy utrymuyetesya, O Dolya, vy budete vyhanyatysya
Vin skazav, I deplore vashi diyi
Miy Lord, ryatuyutʹ meni ta moya rodyna z yikhnikh pratsʹ
My vryatuvaly yoho ta vsyu yoho rodynu
Ale ne stara zhinka; vona pryrikalasʹ
My todi zruynuvaly inshi
My showered yim z neshchasnoyu zlyvoyu; shcho strashna zlyva dlya tsykh khto buly poperedzhenyy
Tse povynno buty urok, ale naybilʹsh lyudy ne viruyuchi
Naybilʹsh bezperechno, vash Lord yavlyaye soboyu Mohutniy, Naybilʹsh Myloserdnyy
Lyudy Lisiv disbelieved kur'yery
Shu`aib skazanyy yim, "Chy ne mohly b vy ne spravedlyvi
ya ye chesnyy kur'yer do vas
Vy budete BOH povahy, ta pidkoryayetesya meni
ya ne proshu vas dlya budʹ-yakoyi zarplaty; moya zarplata prybuvaye tilʹky z Lorda vsesvitu
Vy budete daty povnu miru koly vy torhivlya; ne obduritʹ
Vy budete zvazhyty z rivnopravnoyu shkaloyu
Ne obduryuyutʹ lyudey z yikhnikh prav, ta ne blukayutʹ zemlya corruptingly
Povaha kotra utvoryla vas ta poperedni heneratsiyi
Vony skazaly, "Vy bewitched
Vy ne ye bilʹsh nizh lyudsʹkyy vyhlyadayuchi yak ny. Faktychno, my dumayemo vy ye brekhun
Dozvolyayete masy z padinnya neba na nas, yakshcho vy ye pravdyvi
Vin skazav, "Miy Lord yavlyaye soboyu odyn khto znaye vse vy
Vony disbelieved yo ta, otzhe, vony zaznaly retribution Dnya Canopy. Tse yavlyalo soboyu retribution awesome denʹ
Tse povynno buty urok, ale naybilʹsh lyudy ne viruyuchi
Naybilʹsh bezperechno, vash Lord yavlyaye soboyu Mohutniy, Naybilʹsh Myloserdnyy
Tse ye vidkryttya z Lorda vsesvitu
Chesnyy Dukh (Gabriel) prybuv vnyz z tse
Shchob vidkryty tse u vashe sertse, shcho vy mozhete buty odni z warners
U doskonalomu arabsʹkomu yazykovi
Tse vishchuvalosʹ u knyhakh poperednikh heneratsiy
tse ne dostatniy znak dlya nykh shcho tse bulo vidome do vchenykh sered Ditey Izrayilya
Yakshcho my vidkryly tse do lyudey shcho ne znayutʹ arabsʹkyy
Ta maly yoho deklamuyutʹ tse (u arabsʹkomu), vony ne mohly mozhlyvo viryty v tse
My takym chynom nadayemo tse (lyubymo inozemnu movu) u serdenʹkakh vynuvatykh
Otzhe, vony ne mozhutʹ viryty v tse; ne do vony bachatʹ bolisnyy retribution
Tse prybude yim raptom, koly vony naymenshi ochikuyutʹ tse
Vony todi skazhutʹ, my 'Mozhemo maty respite
vony ne vyklyk nash retribution
Tomu shcho vy dyvytesʹ, my dozvolyly yim otrymaty nasolodu vid protyahom rokiv
Todi retribution prybuv yim, tilʹky yak poobitsyane
Yikhni prostori resursy ne dopomohly yim u naymenshym
My nikoly ne vynyshchuyemo budʹ-yaku spilʹnotu bez toho, shchob posylaty warners
Tomu, tse ye reminder, dlya my nikoly ne unjust
chorty mozhutʹ nikoly ne vidkryty tse
Vony ni by, ni mohly
Dlya vony pereshchkodzhayutʹsya slukhannyu
Tomu, ne idolize bilya BOHA budʹ-yakyy inshyy boh, lest vy zaznayete retribution
Vy budete propoviduvaty do lyudey shcho ye naybilʹsh blyzʹki do vas
Ta nyzhche vashe krylo dlya viruyuchiv shcho sliduyutʹ za vamy
Yakshcho vony ne pidkoryayutʹsya vam, todi kazhete, "ya zrikayusya yaki vy
Ta postavlena vasha dovira u Mohutnya, Naybilʹsh Myloserdna
Khto bachytʹ vas koly vy rozdumuyete pid chas nochi
Ta vashi chasti prostrations
Vin yavlyaye soboyu Slukhacha, Omniscient
ya Budu poinformuvaty vas na komu chortiv spuskayetesya
Vony spuskayutʹsya na kozhnyy vynuvatyy fabricator
Vony prykydayutʹsya poslukhaty, ale bilʹshistʹ yikh brekhuny
Yak dlya poetiv, vony slidkuyutʹsya tilʹky strayers
vy ne dyvytesʹ shcho yikhni zmina virnosti z·hidno z sytuatsiyeyu
Ta shcho yak kazhutʹ yaki vony ne roblyatʹ
Zvilʹnenyy ye tsey khto vvazhayutʹ, vedutʹ spravedlyve zhyttya, svyatkuyutʹ BOHA chasto, ta zakhyshchayutʹ yikhni prava. Bezsumnivno, porushnyky znaydutʹ shcho yikhnyu ostatochnu dolyu
Tsey (lysty) utvoryuyutʹ dokazy Quran; hlyboke svyate pysannya
beacon, ta harna novyna, dlya viruyuchiv
Khto zauvazhuyutʹ Kontaktni Molytvy (Salat), dayutʹ obov'yazkovu dobrodiynistʹ (Zakat), ta vony, shcho stosuyetʹsya U maybutnʹomu, absolyutno pevnyy
Tsey khto ne virymo v U maybutnʹomu, my prykrashayemo yikhni pratsi u yikhnikh ochakh. Otzhe, vony prodovzhuyutʹsya do pomylky
Tse - tsey khto zaznayutʹ nayhirshoho retribution, ta u U maybutnʹomu, vony budutʹ nayhirshyy losers
Bezsumnivno, vy otrymuyete Quran z duzhe Mudroho, Omniscient
Vidklykannya shcho Moses skazanyy yoho rodyni, "ya bachu vohonʹ; dozvolenyy meni prynosyte vam novynu zvidty, abo smoloskyp do teplykh vas
Koly vin prybuv yomu, vin buv zaklykanyy: "Blahoslovlenyy yavlyaye soboyu (khto rozmovlyaye z) v mezhakh vohnyu, ta tsʹoho navkolo tse." Slava musytʹ BOH, Lord vsesvitu
O Moses, tse Meni, BOH, Mohutniy, Naybilʹsh Mudryy
Kydayutʹ vnyz vash personal." Koly vin pobachyv tse rukh lyublyatʹ demona, vin povernuvsya navkolo ta fled. "O Moses, ne boyatʹsya. Moyi kur'yery ne budutʹ bo
Krim tsykh khto zdiysnyuyutʹ porushennya, todi zaminyayutʹ righteousness pislya toho yak hrishyty; YA Probachayu, Naybilʹsh Myloserdnyy
Stavlyatʹ vash vruchayutʹ vashu kyshenyu; tse vyyde bile, bez plyamy. Tsey sered dev'yaty dyv Pharaoh ta yoho lyudy, dlya vony ye bezputni lyudy
Koly nashi dyva navodylysʹ yim, yasni ta hlyboki, vony skazaly, "Tse ye ochevydno mahichne
Vony vidkhylyly yikh ta nadzvychayno buly perekonani yikhnikh nepravylʹnykh shlyakhiv, zavdyaky yikhniy zukhvalosti. Prymitka naslidky dlya evildoers
My nadaly pravo David ta Solomon z znannyam, ta vony skazaly, "Khvalyatʹ BOHA dlya toho, shchob blahoslovlyaty nas bilʹsh nizh bahato Yoho viryachykh sluzhbovtsyam
Solomon David spadkoyemetsʹ. Vin skazav, "O lyudy, my buly nadani pravo z rozuminnyam mova ptakhiv, ta vsi riznovydy rechey buly podarovani namy. Tse ye diysno realʹne blahoslovennya
Mobilizovuvaly u sluzhbi Solomon buly yoho slukhnyani soldaty jinns ta humans, tak zhe, yak i ptakhy; vesʹ u yoho rozporyadzhenni
Koly vony nablyzhalysya valley murakh, odyn murakha skazav, "O vy murakhy, idutʹ u vashi domivky, lest vy pryyizhdzhayete rozdavleni Solomon ta yoho soldaty, bez toho, shchob spryymaty

Vin posmikhnuvsya ta smiyavsya z yiyi tverdzhennya, ta skazalo, "Miy Lord, bezposeredniy meni shchob buty appreciative blahoslovennya Vy podaruvaly meni ta moyi batʹky, ta shchob zrobyty spravedlyvi pratsi shcho budʹ laska Vy. Dopustitʹ meni Vashym myloserdyam u kompaniyu Vashykh spravedlyvykh sluzhbovtsiv
Vin obstezhyv ptakhiv, ta vydatni: "Chomu ya ne dyvlyusya hoopoe? Chomu ye vin vidsutniy
ya pokarayu yoho suvoro abo zhertvuyu yo, yakshcho ne vin daye meni harne probachennya
Vin ne zachekav na dovhoho. (hoopoe) skazav, "ya mayu novynu shcho vy ne. YA prynis do vas z Sheba, deyakoyi vazhlyvoyi informatsiyi
ya znayshov zhinku postanova yim, khto blahoslovlyayetʹsya z vse, ta volodiye velycheznym palatsom
ya znayshov yiyi ta yiyi lyudey prostrating pered sontsem, zamistʹ BOHA. Chort prykrasyv yikhni pratsi u yikhnikh ochakh, ta vidbyty yikh z shlyakhu; otzhe, vony ne keruyutʹsya
Vony musyly prostrating pered tym, yak BOH, khto proyavlyayetʹsya vsi tayemnytsi u nebi ta zemli, ta khto znaye vse vy prykhovuyete ta vse vy zayavlyayete
BOH: nemaye inshoho boha bilya Yoho; Lord z velykym dominion
(Solomon) skazaly, "My pobachymo yakshcho vy kazaly pravdu, abo yakshcho vy ye brekhun
Berutʹ tsey lyst z meni, dayutʹ tse yim, todi sposterihayutʹ dlya yikhnʹoyi vidpovidi
Vona skazala, "O moyi radnyky, ya otrymav pochesnyy lyst
Tse ye z Solomon, ta tse, `in nazva BOHA, Naybilʹsh Dobrozychlyvoho, Naybilʹsh Myloserdnoho
Proholoshuyutʹ: `do ne budutʹ zukhvalyy; prybutyy meni yak submitters
Vona skazala, "O moyi radnyky, radnyk meni u tsiy materiyi. YA ne vyrishuyu budʹ shcho do vy radyte meni
Vony skazaly, "My volodiyemo potuzhnistyu, my volodiyemo boryuchymy vminnyamy, ta ostatochna komanda ye u vashiy rutsi. Vy vyrishyte shcho zrobyty
Vona skazala, koroli pidkupayutʹ budʹ-yaki zemelʹni vony zakhoplyuyutʹ, ta pidkoryayutʹ yoho dignified lyudy. Tse ye yaki vony zvychayno
ya posylayu darunok yim; dozvolʹte nam dyvlyatʹsya shcho kur'yery povertayutʹsya

Koly hoopoe povernuvsya Solomon (vin kazav yomu novynu), ta vin vidpoviv (Sheba lyudy): vy dayete meni hroshi? Yakyy BOH danyy meni daleko krashche nizh yakyy Vin dav vam. Vy yavlyayete soboyu tishytysya z takykh darunkiv
(Do hoopoe, vin skazav,) "Idemo nazad do nykh (ta dozvolyayemo yim znayemo shcho) my prybudemo yim z sylamy vony ne mozhutʹ uyavyty. My budemo evict yim, prynyzyly ta debased
Vin skazav, "O vy elders, kotryy vy mozhete prynesty meni yiyi osobnyak, pered tym, yak vony mozhutʹ prybuty tut yak submitters
afrit z jinns skazav, "ya mozhu prynesty tse do vas pered tym, yak vy vstayete. YA vystachayu potuzhnyy shchob zrobyty tse

khto ovolodiv znannyam z knyhy skazav, "ya mozhu prynesty tse do vas u blymayete vashoho oka." Koly vin pobachyv tse ulahodzhenyy pered yo, vin skazav, "Tse ye blahoslovennya z moho Lorda, tym samym Vin vyprobovuye meni, shchob pokazaty ya chy appreciative abo unappreciative. Whoever appreciative appreciative dlya yoho vlasnyy harnyy, ta yakshcho kozhnyy povertaye unappreciative, todi miy Lord ye u ne treba dlya nʹoho, Naybilʹsh Pochesnyy
Vin skazav, "Remodel yiyi osobnyak dlya neyi. Dozvolʹte nam dyvlyatʹsya yakshcho vona bude keruvatysya, abo prodovzhuyutʹsya z misguided

Koly vona prybula, vona bula poproshena, vash osobnyak vyhlyadaye, yak tse?" Vona skazala, "Mabutʹ shcho tse tse." (Solomon skazaly,) "My znaly zavchasno shcho vona zbyralasya zrobyty, ta my vzhe submitters
Vona bula vidvedena obozhnyuyuchy idoliv zamistʹ BOHA; vona nalezhala disbelieving lyudy

Vona bula kazana, "Idutʹ vseredyni palats." Koly vona dyvylasya yoho ministerstvo vnutrishnikh sprav, vona podumala tse buv baseyn vody, ta vona (tyahnula yiyi odyah,) exposing yiyi nohy. Vin skazav, "Tse ministerstvo vnutrishnikh sprav zaraz paved z kryshtalem." Vona skazala, "Miy Lord, ya obrazyv moyu dushu. YA zaraz pidkoryayusya z Solomon do BOHA, Lorda vsesvitu
My poslaly Thamoud yikhniy brat Saaleh, kazhuchy, "Vy budete obozhnyuvaty BOHA." Ale vony povernulysya u dva feuding fraktsiya
Vin skazav, "O moyi lyudy, chomu vy hasten zdiysnyty zlo zamistʹ harnykh pratsʹ? Yakby tilʹky vy blahayete BOHA dlya forgiveness, vy mozhete dosyahnuty myloserdya
Vony skazaly, "My roz·hlyadayemo vas pohana oznaka dlya nas, vy ta tsey khto pryyednalysya do vas." Vin skazav, "Vasha oznaka tsilkom kontrolyuyetʹsya BOHOM. Diysno, vy ye deviant lyudy
Tam buv dev'yatʹ hanhsteriv po mistu khto buv bezputnyy, ta nikoly budʹ shcho harnyy
Vony skazaly, "Dozvolyayutʹ nam prysyahayutʹ BOHOM shcho my ubyvayemo yoho ta yoho lyudey, todi rozpovidayemo yoho plem'ya, `we znayemo nichoho pro yikhnyu smertʹ. My ye pravdyvi
Vony zrobyly zmovu ta zamysleni, ale my takozh zrobyly zmovu ta zamysleni, v toy chas, yak vony ne spryynyaly
Prymitka naslidky yikhnʹoho kreslyachykh; my vynyshchyly yikh ta vsikh yikhnikh lyudey
Osʹ yikhni domivky nadzvychayno zruynuvaly, vnaslidok yikhnʹoho porushennya. Tse povynno buty urok dlya lyudey shcho znayutʹ
My ryatuyemo tsi khto vvazhayutʹ ta vedemo spravedlyve zhyttya
Dolya skazana yoho lyudyam, "Yak vy mohly zdiysnyty takyy abomination, suspilʹno, v toy chas, yak vy mohly pobachyty
Vy statʹ praktyky z lyudʹmy, lustfully, zamistʹ zhinok. Diysno, vy ye neobiznani lyudy
